How to Use Guardian News Article Search App
 Welcome to the Guardian News Article Search App! Here's how to get started:
 
 Search for Articles:
 
 Open the app to the main screen.
 Enter a keyword in the search box at the top of the screen.
 Press the "Search" button to find articles from The Guardian related to your query.
 View Article Details:
 
 Tap on any article in the list to view more details including the article's title, URL, and the section it belongs to.
 Click on the URL to open the full article in your device's web browser for complete reading.
 Add to Favorites:
 
 While viewing an article's details, you can add it to your favorites by clicking the "Add to Favorites" button.
 This saves the article for easy access later, even when offline.
 Access and Manage Favorites:
 
 Open the navigation drawer by tapping the menu icon in the top left corner of the main screen.
 Select "Favorites" to view your saved articles.
 Long press on an article in the favorites list to remove it from your favorites.
